title: I'm not a fan of Game Of Thrones, writer Bernard Cornwell says - Thetelegraphand Argus
text:
His historical Saxon novels have been turned into eight-part BBC Two drama series The Last Kingdom and have drawn comparisons with the hit HBO drama based on George RR Martin's books. He told Radio Times: "So many characters.
